note.p: Burial: Beside his wife, to the east of Hatfield church, Hertfordshire
Education: Eton; Christ Church, Oxford. BA (1850); MA (1853); DCL (1869)

Career: MP for Stamford (1853-1868); Privy Councillor (1866); Secretary of State for India (1866-1867 and 1874-1878); Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs (1878-1880, 1885-1886 and 1887-1892); Prime Minister (1885-1886, 1886-1892, 1895-1902)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 319-325, plate, signed by H McL
References: Vanity Fair 10 July 1869, 05 July 1882 (group), 20 December 1900
